extracted_text:
There are a few potentially significant corporate developments for INDUSINDBK Ltd that occurred on August 26, 2025. According to The Economic Times , Rajiv Anand officially took over as the MD & CEO of IndusInd Bank, starting his three-year term. Following this, the previously established 'Committee of Executives' and the 'Oversight Committee of the Board' were dissolved.

Additionally, news from Mint indicates that IndusInd Bank shareholders blocked the promoters' bid to appoint 2 directors on the same day.

Based on the search results, these events appear to be the most substantial corporate developments for INDUSINDBK Ltd on August 26, 2025.
